CatDescriptText: Alma Illery (d. 1972) talking with young girls in an interior thought to be on Wylie Avenue.   Alma Illery, tireless community worker, helped integrate hospitals in the 1940s, founded the Achievement Club, and ran Camp Achievement for many years.  The Alma Illery Health Center on Hamilton Avenue in Homewood is named after her.
TitMainTitle: Two women, including Alma Illery wearing light colored hat, standing in front of group of girls, in interior
